data.title: Excellent menu, location and value
data.text: This restaurant provided an excellent chance to wine taste from many different wineries all in one location.  They have multiple flights to choose from (3 glasses of 2oz each) for $9-$11.  They also have excellent food to complement the wine (cheese plate, paninis, chocolates, etc).

data.title: Snazzy Wine Bar
data.text: We love to sit outside and enjoy our Moscato wine.  Great sofa seating inside also.  This is only place on the School Street strip to offer 'Slushies'  which are super nice during the hot summers here, and they are a WoW.  A nice variety of wine from a variety of wineries.  Snack menu also.  Took my niece here for chocolate day and had a great time.

data.title: Excellent!
data.text:
Great wines, especially love the 0ne ounce combination trials. Loved the Muscat from the Italian selection.
The panini's are fabulous, enjoyed the pesto panini with a side of olives. The olives were to die for!
Great service. Atmosphere is fabulous.
Agree with some other comments, "best wine bar in downtown"!
Highly recommend!

data.title: Saturday nights are so much fun!
data.text:
Our couples' trip was full of fun and wine, but our visit here on Saturday took the cake! We had so much fun, our intented aingle tasting turned into almost 4 hours of drinking, dancing and karaoke! The service was excellent, the wines were great, and the Karaoke hist Will Smith made us stay even longer. We danced to his music, danced to other people singing and even sang ourselves.  We had the best time and would definitely come back. The rest of the other patrons were so fun and friendly too!

Also, the appetizers were delcious as well!

data.title: Favorite Wine Bar
data.text: Best wine bar on the downtown strip - we frequently stop here for an afternoon or evening glass of wine.  Love the outside seating, and the comfy cozy sofa seating inside.  Small intimate tables as well as a very large table (for 8 or more) if you need it.  During the summer, they offer wine slushies - fabulous.  Great variety of wines offerred; red, white, dry, sweet.   Snacks to accompany your wine also offered.  The antipasto tray is good.  Recently added evening entertainment on weekends featuring local artists.  I've even seen ukuele players sitting outside.  Downtown parking lots in walking distance, limited street parking.
